themes: mobility challenges for handicapped and elderly
key_phrases: Provide wheelchairs, scooters, and LOTS of benches in ALL city-funded events and spaces
City money should = EVERYONE has access, don't you agree?
Every time you make us take shuttle busses and make physical access more difficult, you decrease the likelihood that handicapped people and the elderly can show up and enjoy it
Think smaller, think neighborhood, and think about mobility access every single time you spend a dime
barriers_identified: lack of mobility aids (wheelchairs, scooters, benches)
physical access difficulties for handicapped and elderly
solutions_proposed: Provide wheelchairs, scooters, and benches at all city-funded events and spaces
Prioritize mobility access in all spending decisions
